thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service and hospitality
thread.title_full: Great service and hospitality - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Karin E
title: Great service and hospitality
text: Great service at all levels. Very friendly staff who helped us to feel at home in London during a long weekend. The kids got some nice welcome package, perfect to spend some time while we were waiting for our in room service as we arrived late in the evening. The kids definatly want to go back - and so do the rest of us as well. The rooms were tastefully decorated and well equipped.
